description: thatch roofed buildings at left behind fence; two-wheeled cart at right; other building at center and right
inscription:
Title, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in pencil: [11435], [x843] and illegible inscription
markings: LRC of image, stamped in red: [E (owl) B] (Buhot collector\'s mark, Lugt 977); on back, stamped in brown: [V / E / S (?)]
provenance: [Todd Butler, London, until 1984; sold, November for PSTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1984-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in pencil: [Les grandes chaummieres]; on back, in pencil: [Les Grandes Chaumieres]
title: The Large Thatched Cottages
